case.name: Di Stefano v Uniline Australia Ltd [2007] FCA 1800 (21 November 2007)

catchphrases.catchphrase: consideration of issues going to discovery

sentences.sentence: 1 For the reasons indicated in QUD236 of 2007 ( Uniline Australia Ltd v SBriggs Pty Ltd [2007] FCA 1799) , the Court makes the Orders reflected in the formal Orders of the Court in this proceeding.
I certify that the preceding one (1) numbered paragraph is a true copy of the Reasons for Judgment herein of the Honourable Justice Greenwood.

Associate:
Dated: 21 November 2007
Counsel for the Applicant: Mr S Cooper

Date of Hearing: 19 November 2007
